content.text:
# New Taipei Kings all-time roster

The following is a list of players, both past and current, who appeared at least in one game for the New Taipei Kings (2021–present) franchise.
__NOTOC__
Players
Note: Statistics are correct through the end of the 2024–25 TPBL season.
{|class="wikitable"
|-
| G || Guard
| G/F || Guard-forward
| F || Forward
| F/C || Forward-center
| C || Center
|}
{| class="wikitable"
*
| Denotes player who has been selected for at least one All-Star Game and is currently on the New Taipei Kings roster
|-
| align="center" bgcolor="#FFCC00" width="20" | +
| Denotes player who has been selected for at least one All-Star Game with the New Taipei Kings
-->
|-
| align="center" bgcolor="#CCFFCC" width="20" | x
| Denotes player who is currently on the New Taipei Kings roster
|-
| align="center" bgcolor="#CFECEC" width="20" | 0.0
| Denotes the New Taipei Kings statistics leader
|-
| align="center" width="20" | player
| Denotes player who has played for the New Taipei Kings in the PLG
|-
| align="center" width="20" | player
| Denotes player who has played for the New Taipei Kings in the EASL
|-
| align="center" width="20" | player
| Denotes player who has played for the New Taipei Kings in the BCL Asia
|-
| align="center" width="20" | (#)
| Denotes that the player's number is retired by the New Taipei Kings
|}
